title: The Void's Hug
author: Mad Marv
pages: Ah, the void! Not an emptiness but life's tightest hug. Jump in, clutch an Ender-lily, and feel it embrace you with dark warmth.
The void tempts with whispers of unknown biomes. Some return bearing tales of luminous caves and talking diamonds.
It's rumored those who slide too far gain the ability to sing lava into song.
Remember, only empty chests are rewarded with the void's embrace. Stuffed chests are an affront, left behind hollow.
